ksa.label: Strategic Thinking
ksa.description: Formulates objectives and priorities, and implements plans consistent with the long-term interests of the organization.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes the importance of long-term planning and can articulate broad goals when prompted.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Contributes to setting objectives and supports initiatives aligned with organizational goals.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Identifies key objectives, anticipates potential obstacles, and supports strategic decisions in moderately complex environments.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Develops multi-year plans and aligns team efforts with strategic priorities. Adjusts strategy based on evolving trends.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Shapes organizational vision. Leads cross-functional planning initiatives and serves as a mentor for strategic development.

ksa.label: Generative AI Proficiency
ksa.description: Ability to effectively use generative AI tools to support creativity, analysis, or automation.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Aware of generative AI tools and has seen them demonstrated.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Can follow instructions to use AI tools for simple tasks.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Uses AI tools independently for content generation or decision support.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Integrates AI tools into workflows, improves prompts, and tailors outputs.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Develops AI-assisted strategies, trains others, and innovates use cases.

ksa.label: Sustainability Practices
ksa.description: Knowledge and application of eco-friendly principles in operational, strategic, or community contexts.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands basic sustainability principles.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Takes individual action to reduce environmental impact.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Promotes sustainability within team or projects.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads sustainability initiatives with measurable impact.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Advises organizations on sustainability integration and innovation.

ksa.label: Virtual Collaboration Tools
ksa.description: Ability to use digital tools to communicate and collaborate effectively in virtual environments.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Knows of digital collaboration tools but needs support to use them.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Uses tools for basic participation in virtual meetings and chats.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Effectively uses tools for teamwork, task management, and file sharing.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Facilitates team collaboration and improves digital processes.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Designs and implements digital collaboration strategies at scale.

ksa.label: Resilience
ksa.description: Ability to recover quickly from setbacks and maintain focus and performance under pressure.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes personal stress and its effects.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Manages minor stress and continues functioning in familiar situations.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Adapts to unexpected challenges while maintaining performance.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Performs consistently under pressure and helps others cope.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads teams through high-pressure situations while promoting well-being.

ksa.label: Emotional Intelligence
ksa.description: Awareness of oneâ€™s emotions and the emotions of others to guide thinking and behavior.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes own emotional states and basic expressions of others.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Responds appropriately to simple emotional cues from others.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Manages emotional responses and adapts behavior based on group dynamics.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Uses emotional insight to influence and guide interpersonal situations.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Mentors others in developing emotional insight and resilience; de-escalates complex emotional conflicts.

ksa.label: Prompt Engineering
ksa.description: Ability to craft effective queries or inputs to AI systems for accurate, useful, or creative outputs.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands what prompts are and how they influence AI outputs.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Uses predefined prompts with minor edits to receive helpful responses.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Iteratively crafts prompts to improve relevance, tone, and accuracy.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Designs complex or layered prompts that align with nuanced user goals.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Trains others and builds prompt libraries optimized for domain-specific uses.

ksa.label: Adaptability
ksa.description: Ability to shift approach and remain effective in changing or uncertain conditions.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Acknowledges discomfort with change but makes an effort to cope.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Adjusts routines with minor support during transitions.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Handles shifting priorities or tools with minimal guidance.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Thinks creatively and remains productive under dynamic conditions.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads adaptive efforts across teams or systems in high-stakes environments.

ksa.label: Critical Thinking
ksa.description: Ability to objectively analyze information, question assumptions, and evaluate outcomes.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes that decisions can be improved through thought and questioning.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Identifies basic patterns or flaws in simple arguments or decisions.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Assesses multiple viewpoints and evaluates trade-offs in common decisions.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Anticipates outcomes, analyzes complex issues, and supports logical conclusions.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Guides critical discourse; challenges assumptions to shape high-impact decisions.

ksa.label: Growth Mindset
ksa.description: Belief in the ability to develop through effort and learning from mistakes.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes that skills can improve over time.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Makes effort to learn from feedback or challenges.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Seeks learning opportunities and reframes failures as growth moments.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Shares and models growth habits with peers or teams.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Drives a culture of continuous learning and supports others in skill development.

ksa.label: Influencing Skills
ksa.description: Ability to persuade others to accomplish goals, gain support, or influence decisions.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands the importance of influencing others to achieve outcomes.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Uses simple techniques (e.g., logic, repetition) to persuade peers in familiar contexts.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Adapts communication style and argument to influence varied stakeholders.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leverages networks and credibility to sway organizational decisions.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Influences across industries, shapes narratives, or shifts policy through expert positioning.

ksa.label: Team Leadership
ksa.description: Ability to guide, motivate, and develop teams to accomplish objectives.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes key responsibilities of team leaders.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Manages simple task delegation and follows up on progress.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Motivates team members and mediates small interpersonal conflicts.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Develops team strategy and facilitates inclusive, high-performing dynamics.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Shapes cross-functional leadership culture and grooms future leaders.

ksa.label: Data Literacy
ksa.description: Ability to read, analyze, and make decisions using data.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands that data can support decisions and has seen data visualizations.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Reads basic charts and draws conclusions with support.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Interprets diverse data sets and draws independent insights.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Applies statistical reasoning to make recommendations.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Designs data-informed systems and mentors others in analytical thinking.

ksa.label: Technical Documentation
ksa.description: Ability to create clear, accurate, and accessible technical content for users or developers.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes the importance of documentation in technical environments.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Edits or contributes to existing documentation with support.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Creates new documentation for common tools or procedures.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads documentation initiatives for cross-team or customer-facing products.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Creates style guides and defines documentation standards for organizations.

ksa.label: Time Management
ksa.description: Ability to prioritize tasks, manage deadlines, and stay organized.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Acknowledges deadlines and the need for personal organization.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Meets most deadlines with reminders or support.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Plans work independently and delivers on time in routine settings.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Manages complex schedules and multiple priorities with minimal oversight.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Trains others and designs systems to improve team-wide time management.

ksa.label: Interpersonal Skills
ksa.description: Ability to build relationships and work well with others.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands the impact of relationships at work.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Maintains courteous interactions in familiar environments.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Navigates diverse relationships with flexibility and tact.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Resolves interpersonal tensions and strengthens group dynamics.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads initiatives that foster culture, trust, and inclusion across groups.

ksa.label: Initiative
ksa.description: Willingness to take action and go beyond what is required without being prompted.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes opportunities to contribute beyond assigned tasks.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Takes basic steps independently to support task or team success.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Volunteers for new responsibilities or solves problems proactively.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Creates and champions new initiatives with measurable benefits.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Models initiative-taking at an organizational level and inspires innovation.

ksa.label: Conflict Management
ksa.description: Ability to handle disagreements constructively and help others reach resolution.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes sources of interpersonal tension or disagreement.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Addresses simple disagreements with direct communication.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Mediates disputes and finds compromise in routine settings.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Resolves persistent conflicts and trains others in resolution techniques.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Designs conflict-resolution protocols or leads high-stakes mediation.

ksa.label: Cultural Awareness
ksa.description: Recognizing and valuing differences in cultural norms, practices, and perspectives.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Acknowledges that people may approach things differently based on culture.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Respects cultural differences in behavior and communication.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Adapts communication or behavior to support cultural inclusion.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Champions cultural inclusion and navigates global perspectives effectively.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Shapes strategy and policy to advance cultural equity and understanding.

ksa.label: Vision
ksa.description: Ability to conceptualize future goals and rally others around them.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands long-term organizational objectives.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Supports short-term plans that align to broader goals.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Articulates and inspires others toward shared goals.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Creates and communicates compelling visions for teams or programs.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads visionary transformation across systems or sectors.

ksa.label: Decision Making
ksa.description: Ability to assess options, evaluate risks, and make sound judgments.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Considers advice and basic facts before deciding.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Makes simple decisions in familiar situations.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Evaluates alternatives and takes responsibility for outcomes.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Makes complex or sensitive decisions with limited information.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Advises or sets decision-making frameworks at an organizational level.

ksa.label: Project Management
ksa.description: Ability to plan, execute, and close work according to deadlines and budget.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Participates in basic projects with clear direction.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Manages simple tasks and timelines independently.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Manages projects with multiple tasks, deadlines, and collaborators.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads multi-phase or cross-functional initiatives.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Designs project management systems and leads large-scale portfolios.

ksa.label: Technology Fluency
ksa.description: Ability to use and adapt to new technologies effectively.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands and observes basic use of tools and systems.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Uses workplace technologies with support or tutorials.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Learns and adapts to multiple tools or platforms independently.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Improves or integrates tools into workflows and processes.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads technology adoption, training, or transformation efforts.

ksa.label: Collaboration
ksa.description: Ability to work effectively with others to achieve shared goals.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes the value of working with others to complete tasks.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Participates in group work and shares information as needed.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Cooperates and contributes ideas toward group problem solving.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Builds consensus, resolves group conflict, and strengthens team cohesion.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads cross-functional teams and builds collaborative partnerships.

ksa.label: Accountability
ksa.description: Takes ownership of responsibilities and outcomes.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands personal role and impact on outcomes.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Meets obligations and admits to minor mistakes when prompted.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Takes responsibility for work and seeks improvement.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Holds self and others accountable to shared standards.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads a culture of integrity and accountability across teams or units.

ksa.label: Systems Thinking
ksa.description: Understands the interconnections between parts of a system and anticipates downstream impacts.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes cause-effect relationships in simple systems.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Identifies basic patterns across processes or teams.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Analyzes how parts influence each other within a system.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Solves problems by aligning system components and addressing root causes.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Designs adaptive systems and trains others in complex thinking.

ksa.label: Change Management
ksa.description: Ability to lead, manage, or respond constructively to organizational change.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Accepts changes in plans and demonstrates flexibility.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Supports team transitions and shares updates clearly.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Guides others through change and addresses concerns effectively.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Develops strategies and processes for implementing change.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads enterprise-level transformation and builds resilient cultures.

ksa.label: User Experience Design (UX)
ksa.description: Designs intuitive, user-centered solutions to enhance product usability.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands importance of usability and interface feedback.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Contributes to simple UX decisions based on user feedback.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Designs wireframes, flows, and prototypes with guidance.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads user testing and develops cross-platform experience strategies.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Shapes UX strategy across products and scales design systems.

ksa.label: Cybersecurity Awareness
ksa.description: Understands common threats and protects digital systems from basic risks.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Follows basic password and email safety guidance.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Identifies suspicious activity and follows security protocols.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Implements safeguards on systems and reports security breaches.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Trains teams and monitors organizational security compliance.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Develops or manages enterprise cybersecurity strategy.

ksa.label: Emotional Intelligence
ksa.description: Recognizing, understanding, and managing one's own emotions and the emotions of others.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes emotional reactions in self and others.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Responds constructively to emotional triggers with support.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Adjusts behavior in real-time to support emotional needs in self and others.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Navigates complex emotional dynamics and supports others in regulating emotion.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Coaches others and integrates emotional intelligence into team and organizational culture.

ksa.label: AI Literacy
ksa.description: Understands foundational concepts, uses, risks, and ethics of artificial intelligence.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands that AI is used in modern tools and platforms.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Can explain common AI applications (e.g., recommendations, chatbots).

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Understands basic models, bias risks, and responsible usage.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Applies AI insights or tools in workflows and understands governance frameworks.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Designs, audits, or leads AI-integrated systems with ethical considerations.

ksa.label: Ethical Reasoning
ksa.description: Evaluates and acts on moral principles when facing complex decisions.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes when a situation presents an ethical question.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Makes decisions guided by stated values and rules.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Navigates ethical gray areas and seeks counsel where needed.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Balances stakeholder needs while maintaining ethical integrity.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Shapes organizational ethics and responds to public scrutiny with transparency.

ksa.label: Sustainability Mindset
ksa.description: Thinks and acts with consideration for long-term ecological, social, and economic impact.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Acknowledges sustainability goals and their importance.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Incorporates simple sustainable practices into daily work.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Identifies opportunities for reducing waste or improving outcomes responsibly.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Develops sustainability-conscious strategies or programs.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads sustainability innovation and influences sector-wide change.

ksa.label: Communication Design
ksa.description: Designs and structures communications to inform, inspire, or mobilize audiences.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands that the way information is presented influences impact.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Selects appropriate formats for simple messages and materials.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Designs messages for varied audiences using tone, visuals, and structure.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Develops persuasive and accessible materials across platforms.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads communication campaigns or influences large-scale public engagement.

ksa.label: Clinical Judgment
ksa.description: Applies evidence-based reasoning and patient information to make medical decisions.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes signs requiring clinical attention.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Applies protocols in predictable clinical scenarios.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Synthesizes symptoms and history for diagnosis in moderate complexity cases.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Prioritizes interventions and adapts approaches in high-stakes environments.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads medical judgment in crises and trains others in advanced reasoning.

ksa.label: Instructional Design
ksa.description: Designs curriculum, learning experiences, and content aligned with learner needs and goals.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands the importance of learning outcomes.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Assists in adapting and delivering learning materials.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Designs lesson plans or modules for a target audience.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Develops full curriculum frameworks with assessments and multimedia integration.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads institutional or cross-industry learning innovation and strategy.

ksa.label: Logistics Coordination
ksa.description: Manages flow of goods, services, and operations efficiently across supply chains.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands basic logistics terms and principles.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Schedules deliveries and communicates shipment statuses.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Manages inventory and vendor coordination in daily operations.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Optimizes supply flows and solves recurring delivery issues.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Designs multi-tier logistics systems and advises on global optimization.

ksa.label: Cyber Threat Analysis
ksa.description: Detects, evaluates, and mitigates cybersecurity threats across digital systems.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes potential vulnerabilities and phishing attempts.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Monitors logs and flags common suspicious activity.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Analyzes patterns to identify and isolate active threats.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Responds to breaches, performs forensic analysis, and patches system weaknesses.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Designs organizational cyber defense protocols and leads threat intelligence efforts.

ksa.label: Customer Experience Management (CX)
ksa.description: Designs and improves customer interactions and satisfaction across touchpoints.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands the value of positive customer interaction.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Delivers consistent service using standard procedures.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Implements feedback systems and improves CX practices.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads CX initiatives and personalizes customer journeys.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Drives customer-centric transformation and brand advocacy across channels.

ksa.label: Hospitality Management
ksa.description: Oversees operations and customer experience in hospitality and service environments.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes importance of guest satisfaction and service standards.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Follows service protocols and responds to routine guest needs.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Coordinates front-of-house or back-end logistics to ensure service quality.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads teams, optimizes operations, and handles complex guest situations.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Drives hospitality innovation and sets standards for brand-wide experience.

ksa.label: Athletic Coaching
ksa.description: Develops physical ability, mental resilience, and team dynamics through training and mentorship.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands training principles and safe practice guidelines.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Delivers practice drills and basic performance feedback.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Leads teams, develops routines, and nurtures growth mindset.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Designs holistic programs and manages performance cycles.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads national-level programs or innovates in performance psychology.

ksa.label: Civic Engagement
ksa.description: Participates in efforts that promote democratic participation and community well-being.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands civic responsibilities and voting processes.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Volunteers or participates in community-driven activities.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Organizes outreach, advocacy, or educational efforts.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Builds coalitions and manages civic or voter mobilization campaigns.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads policy impact work or civic innovation at scale.

ksa.label: Media Literacy
ksa.description: Analyzes and evaluates media sources to distinguish fact, bias, and influence.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Identifies types of media and content sources.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Recognizes bias and verifies basic facts.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Interprets framing and motives behind media narratives.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Teaches media critique and digital safety.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Influences curriculum or policy on media and digital citizenship.

ksa.label: Emergency Response Coordination
ksa.description: Manages resources and procedures during critical incidents to ensure safety and recovery.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Knows basic emergency procedures and roles.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Assists in drills or mobilizes supplies during response.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Leads response teams and executes continuity plans.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Coordinates agencies and implements cross-system protocols.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Designs emergency systems or leads disaster recovery across jurisdictions.

ksa.label: Construction Safety
ksa.description: Implements safety protocols and hazard prevention measures on job sites.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands importance of site safety and basic PPE usage.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Follows safety procedures and identifies minor risks.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Conducts hazard assessments and enforces safety protocols.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads site-wide safety practices and ensures compliance.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Designs safety systems and contributes to industry safety standards.

ksa.label: Visual Storytelling
ksa.description: Conveys narratives through visual media and design.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes elements of compelling visual content.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Uses images and basic tools to support messaging.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Develops cohesive visual narratives across media formats.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads visual campaigns with layered emotional impact.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Shapes brand identity or directs complex multimedia productions.

ksa.label: Experimental Design
ksa.description: Designs research experiments to test hypotheses and control variables.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands basic structure of controlled studies.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Assists in preparing or executing structured experiments.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Designs testable experiments with replicable methods.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads complex studies and adjusts design for real-world constraints.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Innovates new methods or designs landmark studies.

ksa.label: Sustainable Farming Practices
ksa.description: Implements agricultural methods that preserve soil, water, and biodiversity.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands importance of ecological balance in farming.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Uses basic sustainable methods like crop rotation.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Applies integrated pest management and water conservation.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Optimizes farm operations for minimal environmental impact.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Advises on or leads agroecological innovation and policy.

ksa.description: Implements safety protocols and hazard prevention measures on job sites.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands importance of site safety and basic PPE usage.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Follows safety procedures and identifies minor risks.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Conducts hazard assessments and enforces safety protocols.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads site-wide safety practices and ensures compliance.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Designs safety systems and contributes to industry safety standards.

ksa.label: Visual Storytelling
ksa.description: Conveys narratives through visual media and design.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes elements of compelling visual content.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Uses images and basic tools to support messaging.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Develops cohesive visual narratives across media formats.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads visual campaigns with layered emotional impact.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Shapes brand identity or directs complex multimedia productions.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands basic structure of controlled studies.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Assists in preparing or executing structured experiments.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Designs testable experiments with replicable methods.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads complex studies and adjusts design for real-world constraints.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Innovates new methods or designs landmark studies.

ksa.label: Sustainable Farming Practices
ksa.description: Implements agricultural methods that preserve soil, water, and biodiversity.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands importance of ecological balance in farming.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Uses basic sustainable methods like crop rotation.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Applies integrated pest management and water conservation.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Optimizes farm operations for minimal environmental impact.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Advises on or leads agroecological innovation and policy.

ksa.label: Mission Readiness
ksa.description: Prepares individuals and systems for high-risk, high-precision environments.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands readiness protocols and team roles.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Executes assigned prep tasks and drills reliably.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Coordinates multi-unit preparation cycles for operations.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Optimizes readiness procedures across teams or systems.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Designs or leads organization-wide mission readiness frameworks.

ksa.label: Energy Systems Optimization
ksa.description: Improves efficiency, reliability, and sustainability of energy generation and use.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes key energy systems and sources.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Assists in monitoring or auditing energy usage.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Implements improvements and maintains systems for efficiency.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Designs and manages large-scale optimization initiatives.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads innovation in clean energy and grid transformation.

ksa.label: Fleet and Route Management
ksa.description: Manages transportation assets and optimizes logistics efficiency.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands types of transport assets and routing basics.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Assists with scheduling and simple route planning.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Manages fleet usage and real-time performance data.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Optimizes multi-modal operations for cost and time.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Designs logistics frameworks and cross-border efficiency systems.

ksa.label: Interactive Experience Design
ksa.description: Creates user-centric, immersive, and gamified environments.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands elements of interactivity and feedback loops.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Uses platforms to create basic user-driven experiences.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Designs engaging systems that respond to behavior.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads development of adaptive, cross-device experiences.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Pioneers immersive design combining behavioral science and tech.

ksa.label: Learning Technology Integration
ksa.description: Implements and evaluates digital tools to support learning objectives.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Identifies basic educational technologies and uses.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Uses common digital tools in instructional settings.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Aligns tech tools to learning outcomes and curriculum.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Implements school- or team-wide educational technology plans.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads district, organization, or platform innovation in EdTech.

ksa.label: Strategic Fund Development
ksa.description: Plans and executes development strategies for nonprofit or mission-driven growth.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands types of funding sources and development roles.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Assists with donor communication and campaign logistics.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Manages fundraising events and annual fund goals.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads major donor outreach, proposals, or grants strategy.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Architects long-term fund development strategies and multi-million dollar campaigns.

ksa.label: Ethical AI Stewardship
ksa.description: Guides responsible implementation and governance of AI systems.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands core AI concepts and ethical considerations.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Participates in ethical reviews and algorithm assessments.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Manages risk, bias mitigation, and responsible data usage.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Implements ethical oversight frameworks for AI systems.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Advises at policy or global level on AI ethics and alignment.

ksa.label: Live Performance Direction
ksa.description: Directs creative and logistical aspects of live entertainment productions.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands basic stagecraft and performance coordination.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Supports rehearsals and simple stage elements.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Manages creative planning and cast/crew alignment.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Directs full productions with technical and creative oversight.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Develops signature performances or leads institution-level programming.

ksa.label: Community Policing and Engagement
ksa.description: Fosters trust and partnership between public safety and local communities.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands public safety mission and public trust importance.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Participates in local outreach and community events.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Builds sustained programs with local leaders and residents.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Integrates engagement models into agency operations.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads national models of inclusive, restorative policing.

ksa.label: Systems Thinking
ksa.description: Understands and applies interdependencies between systems to solve complex problems.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes components of a system and their connections.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Maps simple system flows and cause-effect relationships.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Designs or modifies systems based on observed patterns.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Solves cross-disciplinary problems using system modeling.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Advises at an ecosystem level or innovates systemic solutions.

ksa.label: Data Modeling
ksa.description: Designs logical structures for data storage, organization, and retrieval.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands data types and formats.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Uses simple data structures and schemas.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Designs scalable models aligned to system goals.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Optimizes models for performance and integrity.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Architects enterprise-level or predictive data environments.

ksa.label: Technical Troubleshooting
ksa.description: Diagnoses and resolves technical problems in software, hardware, or systems.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Identifies when systems are malfunctioning.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Follows prescribed steps to isolate issues.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Analyzes root causes and applies standard fixes.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Creates solutions for non-standard or recurring issues.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Develops diagnostic protocols and leads innovation in system reliability.

ksa.label: Cloud Architecture
ksa.description: Designs and manages cloud-based infrastructure and services.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands basic concepts of cloud storage and services.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Implements simple cloud-hosted solutions or migrations.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Manages multiple cloud systems and resources.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Designs secure, scalable, multi-cloud environments.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Architects resilient global cloud infrastructures.

ksa.label: Scientific Literacy
ksa.description: Applies scientific methods, reasoning, and evidence in inquiry or innovation.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands the role of hypotheses and evidence.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Uses logical steps to collect or interpret results.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Evaluates research claims and tests them independently.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Applies methodology to novel problems or fields.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Synthesizes complex data and leads research innovation.

ksa.label: Systems Thinking
ksa.description: Understands and applies interdependencies between systems to solve complex problems.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes components of a system and their connections.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Maps simple system flows and cause-effect relationships.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Designs or modifies systems based on observed patterns.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Solves cross-disciplinary problems using system modeling.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Advises at an ecosystem level or innovates systemic solutions.

ksa.label: Strategic Visioning
ksa.description: Develops and communicates long-range goals aligned with mission and market forces.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands the importance of vision in guiding strategy.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Supports vision alignment at the team or department level.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Contributes to long-range planning with contextual awareness.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads development of adaptable strategic direction.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Articulates a compelling, innovative vision that reshapes an organization or sector.

ksa.label: Influence and Persuasion
ksa.description: Gains support for ideas, proposals, or initiatives across diverse stakeholders.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes persuasive communication styles and their impact.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Communicates persuasively within familiar settings.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Tailors influence strategies to different audiences.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Drives adoption of ideas or changes across groups.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Shapes public opinion or industry direction through influence.

ksa.label: Adaptive Resilience
ksa.description: Maintains composure, purpose, and learning orientation in the face of disruption.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes stressors and their impact on decisions.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Perseveres through moderate pressure with guidance.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Responds constructively to changing demands or failures.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads others through volatility or recovery efforts.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Models transformative resilience and mentors others in crisis leadership.

ksa.label: Systems Leadership
ksa.description: Builds bridges across sectors, scales, and silos to solve complex societal or enterprise challenges.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands broad ecosystem dynamics and relationships.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Participates in cross-functional teams with shared goals.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Aligns resources and actors across departments or domains.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Guides coalitions and policy shifts with long-range impact.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Influences or redesigns societal systems through coalition-based leadership.

ksa.label: Talent Development
ksa.description: Cultivates othersâ€™ potential through mentoring, coaching, and opportunity creation.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes potential in others and supports growth mindsets.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Provides feedback and supports peer learning.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Mentors others with tailored growth planning.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Leads strategic talent or learning initiatives.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Builds cultures of development or reforms talent ecosystems.

ksa.label: Accountability
ksa.description: Holds self and others responsible for measurable high-quality, timely, and cost-effective results.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Recognizes the importance of meeting commitments.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Completes tasks as assigned and acknowledges responsibilities.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Takes ownership of team results and resolves issues proactively.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Ensures organizational accountability with structured oversight.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Establishes accountability frameworks across departments or agencies.

ksa.label: Customer Service
ksa.description: Works with clients and customers (internal or external) to assess needs, provide information, and resolve problems.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Understands importance of customer satisfaction.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Responds to routine inquiries with support.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Anticipates needs and offers tailored solutions.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Develops service systems that improve client satisfaction.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads strategic improvements to organizational service models.

ksa.label: Collaboration
ksa.description: Works cooperatively with others to achieve shared goals.

levels.title: Awareness
levels.description: Participates in group work and respects others' roles.

levels.title: Basic
levels.description: Actively listens and contributes ideas in group settings.

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Encourages cooperation and mediates conflict among team members.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Drives interdepartmental initiatives with collaborative frameworks.

levels.title: Expert
levels.description: Leads cross-sector or multi-organizational partnerships.
